message.body: Heads up-I took the girls out but Simone didn't do anything...you might want to run her outside when you get back. Hope you guys enjoyed the movie!
Hello there! Did Simone eat breakfast?...
Nope, since i didnt have time to walk her i didnt feed her. Please feed the simoonbear
Breakfast is served. How is your Monday morning treating you?
Good, final was served, now begins the tedium of grading. Pho and movie tonight?
That sounds lovely. I don't get out of class until 9, so you might want to start eating without me. (3 1/2 hours of Physics-Ahhhhhhhhh!)
K, ill have some supper waiting for you
